Biar Nggak Ada Lagi Anggaran Lem Aibon Rp 82 M, Sri Mulyani Gandeng Tito
02 Nov 2019, 05:14 by Andhika Prasetia, Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Mendagri Tito Karnavian/Foto: Rolando FS/detikcom

Jakarta - Proses pembahasan anggaran di DKI tengah jadi sorotan. Pemicunya adalah anggaran lem Aibon Rp 82 miliar dan pengadaan bolpoin Rp 124 miliar. Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati dan Menteri Dalam Negeri Tito Karnavian pun buka suara menanggapi anggaran tersebut. Menkeu Sri Mulyani mengatakan akan menggandeng Kementerian Dalam Negeri untuk mendongkrak kualitas anggaran pendapatan dan belanja daerah (APBD)."Kami nanti akan bekerja sama dengan Kementerian Dalam Negeri dalam meningkatkan kualitas APBD tentunya," kata Sri di kantor Kementerian Keuangan, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dia menambahkan semua hal akan dikoordinasikan untuk menunjang hal tersebut."Dan berbagai hal nanti akan kami koordinasikan bersama," ujar mantan Direktur Pelaksana Bank Dunia itu.Sebelumnya, Mendagri Tito Karnavian akan berbicara dengan Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan soal masalah alokasi anggaran tersebut."Saya kan baru juga. Nanti saya komunikasikan dengan Pak gubernur. Saya sendiri kan baru. Bicara dengan Pak Anies dan Pak Prasetio (Ketua DPRD DKI Prasetio Edi Marsudi, red), saya kan kenal baik dua-duanya," ujar Tito di Kompleks Istana Kepresidenan, Rabu (30/10/2019).Tito mengatakan, masih ada mekanisme internal di Pemprov DKI. Tito belum akan mengintervensi."Kita lihat saja nanti. Kan masih ada mekanisme internal di sana. Ada inspektoratnya, ada kajian di DPRD-nya. Kita belum mengintervensi sampai ke sana dulu," kata Tito.Simak Video "Heboh Anggaran Lem Aibon Rp 82 M, Mendagri Belum Mau Intervensi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](/hns)

So There Is No More Budget Aibon Rp. 82 billion, Sri Mulyani Partners with Tito
02 Nov 2019, 05:14 by Andhika Prasetia, Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Minister of Home Affairs Tito Karnavian / Photo: Rolando FS / detikcom

Jakarta - The budget discussion process in DKI is in the spotlight. The trigger was the Aibon glue budget of Rp. 82 billion and the procurement of Rp. 124 billion for ballpoint pens. Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati and Home Minister Tito Karnavian also spoke in response to the budget. Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani said that he would work with the Ministry of Home Affairs to boost the quality of the regional budget (APBD). "We will work with the Ministry of Home Affairs to improve the quality of the regional budget," Sri said at the Ministry of Finance office, Jakarta, Friday (1 /11/2019).He added that everything would be coordinated to support this matter. "And we will coordinate various matters together," said the former Managing Director of the World Bank. Previously, Minister of Home Affairs Tito Karnavian would speak with DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan about "I am new too. Later I will communicate with the governor. I am new myself. Talk to Mr. Anies and Mr. Prasetio (Chair of DKI DPRD Prasetio Edi Marsudi, ed), I know both of them well," said Tito at the Presidential Palace Complex, Wednesday (10/30/2019). Tito said, there were still internal mechanisms in the DKI Provincial Government. Tito will not intervene. "We'll see. There is still an internal mechanism there. There is an inspectorate, there is a study in the DPRD. We have not intervened until we get there first," said Tito.
